column1: Jack is in the kitchen in his house. Jack wants a cold drink from the refrigerator. The refrigerator is full of fresh food. Suddenly, a power cut changes the state of the food in the refrigerator to spoiled. Jack doesn't notice the power cut.
column3: Jack will open the refrigerator to get a cold drink.
column4: Jack will throw away the spoiled food.

column1: Caden is in his new house. Caden wants to fix all the things that are not right. There is a big leak in the roof. Suddenly, the sun comes out and dries up the leak. Caden doesn't see the sun dry up the leak.
column3: Caden will call a man to fix the leak.
column4: Caden will go out and play.

column1: Vivi is in her room playing with her toys. Vivi wants to lay her small, patient triangle toy on the shelf with her other toys. The triangle toy is in her toy box. Suddenly, her baby brother crawls into the room and takes the triangle toy. Vivi doesn't see her baby brother take the triangle toy.
column3: Vivi will lay the triangle toy on the shelf.
column4: Vivi will go to find another triangle toy.

column1: Emma is in her room after a long day at school. Emma wants to draw on her white bathrobe to make it look creative. The bathrobe is plain and white. Suddenly, a spill from a bottle of bleach changes the bathrobe from white to a patchy white and yellow. Emma doesn't see the bleach spill.
column3: Emma will start drawing on her bathrobe.
column4: Emma will dye the whole bathrobe yellow.
